about_the_game:
You will go on an exciting journey, where you will be waiting for various Easter eggs, references, as well as difficult obstacles, platforms, mazes that require reaction and the ability to control your character. Strive to get to the very top the fastest to prove your superiority!

In the game you will find:
Trampolines
Possibility of getting stuck in textures
Excellent optimization
Interaction with twitch chat
Much more

If you are a streamer on Twitch, then this is a great opportunity to start interacting with your viewers. All you need to connect your Twitch is to enter your nickname correctly, after that you will have 4 options for interacting with you on the screen, the audience remains to write their choice in the chat from 1 to 4 and after 30 seconds they will either help you climb higher, or vice versa they will interfere in every possible way!


Your goal is to overcome a series of difficult obstacles using parkour skills and reach the top. You have to make jumps, pave paths on narrow railings, do tricks and avoid dangers to climb higher and higher.

You will have to use your reaction, flexibility and precision to overcome obstacles and move forward. Thanks to precise controls and excellent motion physics, you will be able to experience the authentic freedom of parkour.

Only ban! It offers exciting visuals and unforgettable adventures. Climb to the top and show the world that you are a real master of parkour!

* Parody game

ONLY BAN!

name: Only Ban!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470@ 3.2 GHz or AMD R5 1600X @ 3.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 10400 3.1 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 2600x 3.1 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: You will go on an exciting journey, where you will be waiting for various Easter eggs, references, as well as difficult obstacles, platforms, mazes that require reaction and the ability to control your character. Strive to get to the very top the fastest to prove your superiority!
supported_languages:
English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian*, Turkish, Ukrainian, Japanese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
